value:
I cannot change that Zephiel and
Bern brought war on the world.
I can only learn from their mistakes.

Elen and Melady have done so much
for me... It is not exaggerating to say
they are to thank for Bern's new way.

*sigh* ...Sometimes I hold my breath
without thinking, like I'm waiting for
something bad to happen.

Walking the halls alone is not how
I wish to spend my time. Gazing from
the window is perfectly suitable.

There are so many Heroes here, all
who have known war... I imagine they
could also teach me of peace.

So you're the $Nu
I was told of...

Zephiel's Bern committed atrocities.
I cannot disregard the terrors of the
coup, and yet...still, I...

I have broken with the violent past
of my people. I will renew the pride
of Bern's royal line!

Brother, watch over me, that my
heart remains steadfast...
I am prepared for whatever awaits.

I am Guinivere, queen of Bern, and
as such, it is my duty to heal the ruin
my country has suffered in its wars.

A soaring wyvern rider is the symbol
of Bern. The Hero Hartmut founded
our nation of warriors.$k$pBut with our wars at an end, we've
reduced our military, lest we be seen
as hungry for further conquest.$k$pBut still the idea of the mighty Bern
remains in the hearts of the people...$k$pStill the memory remains of Zephiel
bringing the continent to its knees
before the three Wyvern Generals.$k$pFor those who revere that Bern, I've
made it a country of cowards—of
chipped fangs and broken spears...$k$pNevertheless, I must remain steadfast.
I will bear it for the sake of Bern, that
it might one day return to glory.$k$pI take comfort, though, knowing the
difficult road ahead will be that much
easier with you at my side...
I will not fail.
For Bern!
I will be my people's shield!
Surely the fighting will end…
I lacked the strength...
I am Guinivere, queen of Bern.
Ah! You certainly seem to enjoy sneaking up on people.
Surely, none of my actions as a leader have been worthy of legend.
My people and I have worked desperately to rebuild Bern after the war.
If I devote myself to my kingdom, I am certain the people will place their faith in me.
I wonder what Zephiel would think of where Bern is headed now...
It would be my greatest joy if what I have learned as queen may be put to use.
As you request.
Be cautious.
I will not lose my way.
